Name: splenic sequestration
Definition: A refractive error characterized by the optics of the eye to focus a point object into a sharp focused image on the retina
Synonym: partial loss or necrosis of ear ossicles

Name: chronic congestive splenomegaly
Definition: A refractive error characterized by the optics of the eye to focus a point object into a sharp focused image on the retina
Synonym: partial loss or necrosis of ear ossicles

Name: splenic abscess
Definition: A myeloma and spenic disease that is located_in the bone marrow that results_in the marrow being replaced by fibrous (scar) tissue and has_symptom abdominal fullness related to an enlarged spleen

Name: splenic infarction
Definition: An organ system cancer located in the hematological system that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in blood

Name: hemangioma of spleen
Definition: A drug dependence that involves the continued use of opiate drugs despite despite problems related to use of the substance.

Name: hypersplenism
Definition: A skin melanoma that is characterized by slow growth of a small pigmented spot on the skin with a clearly defined edge

Name: spleen cancer
Definition: A lymphatic system cancer that affects white blood cells and involves tumor deposits in the spleen.

Name: splenic tuberculosis
Definition: An abdominal tuberculosis that results_in formation of granulomas or abscesses located_in spleen.
